item.title: (Project 3: Bio-informatics) Computational Drug Design
item.description: Used SMILES notation to compute Lipinski’s descriptors, collected the data from ChEMBLdatabase. Performed exploratory Data Analysis, computed molecular descriptors using PADELDescriptorssoftware & prepared (X, Y) data frames. Applied Random Forest Algorithm & for better understanding of accuracy level, plotted a graph using matplotlib library. This Projectâ€™s GitHub Repository
